snippet.title: Mutant Football League 2 – Create Your Own Mutant Dream Team
snippet.description:
Check out our latest feature reveal in this action-packed trailer, showcasing the all-new Create Your Own Mutant Dream Team mode and the Doom Field Designer, where you build and customize your own deadly home turf. 

Mutant Football League 2 Play MFL2 for Xbox Game Preview at https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p72ljj5srx0 

Play MFL2 for Steam Early Access at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1657320/Mutant_Football_League_2/ 
#Wishlist MFL2 on Steam - https://bit.ly/MFL2onSTEAM 

Please Note: Mutant Football League 2 is currently under development, and we consider it to be a pre-Alpha state. As a result, you may notice visual glitches or other issues in the footage presented. Rest assured, these issues will be addressed and resolved before the game ships in Fall 2025! 

MFL2 takes arcade-style football to a whole new level with bone-crushing hits, strategic 8-on-8 gameplay, and a roster of outrageous mutants that parody your favorite players. Created by the legendary designer behind Mutant League Football and Mutant League Hockey, this game delivers unrelenting action, over-the-top gridiron carnage like never before. 

For all things Mutant League: https://www.mutantfootballleague.com/ 

MFL Social Media: https://linktr.ee/mutantfootball 

Developed by Digital Dreams Entertainment Inc. 

The gameplay of this video was captured on a PC.
